headline: S&P Downgrades Edison International (EIX) to BBB- on Concerns About Wildfire Fund
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is one of the S&P 500 stocks with a low PE ratio. On September 17, concerns over a diminishing wildfire fund led S&P Global Ratings to downgrade Edison International from BBB to BBB- with a negative outlook. S&P lowered the rating based on forecasts that California’s wildfire fund will not touch prior […]
